attributes.action: Change Creamfields’ “HALO” stage into a 360 experience
attributes.additional_details: Ensure Creamfields put the stage in the middle of the new “HALO” stage. Otherwise we will all be severely disappointed and maybe even throw eggs there, rather than shapes.
attributes.background: Ensure Creamfields put the stage in the middle of the new “HALO” stage. Otherwise we will all be severely disappointed and maybe even throw eggs there, rather than shapes.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about stages at Creamfields are a matter for the organisers of Creamfields, not the UK Government or Parliament.
